summaries.title: CoinEx Reinforces Transparency with Updated Proof of Reserves
summaries.summary: CoinEx, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, has reaffirmed its commitment to transparency by updating its proof of reserves as of March 31, 2025, at 08:00 UTC. The updated asset reserve ratio maintains a 1:1 ratio between the total assets held and the users' balances.

summaries.title: Sell IT, buy pharma? What Trump tariffs mean for Indian stock market investors
summaries.summary: This text discusses the impact of Trump's tariffs on the Indian stock market, specifically focusing on small- and micro-cap stocks. Despite a slight dip in the broader market, these smaller companies managed to avoid significant volatility. In comparison, other major stock markets in the US and Asia suffered greater declines due to the tariffs, with the NASDAQ, Hang Seng, and Nikkei all falling by 3% or more. Despite this, the Indian stock market remained relatively stable.

summaries.title: Luis de Guindos: Financial stability in uncertain times
summaries.summary: The European Central Bank (ECB) is responsible for maintaining financial stability within the European Union, specifically for countries that have adopted the euro. The ECB's primary goal is to ensure price stability in the euro area in order to protect the value of the single currency.

news_data.text: Tron’s Justin Sun Accuses First Digital Trust (FDT) of Being Insolvent and Demands Hong Kong Authorities Intervene Justin Sun, the founder of TRON, accused First Digital Trust (FDT), the issuer of FDUSD, of being insolvent and unable to back up its token.
